title: Risk1 (Riskettan)
subtitle: Essential risk awareness course for all new drivers

hero.title: Risk1 - Riskettan Course
hero.description: Risk1 (Riskettan) is a mandatory course for all new drivers in Sweden. This comprehensive 3-hour course covers critical topics including alcohol, drugs, fatigue, and risky driving behaviors.

overview.title: Course Overview
overview.description: The Risk1 course is designed to educate new drivers about the dangers and risks associated with driving. It's a mandatory requirement before taking your practical driving test.
highlights: Mandatory course for all new drivers

modules.title: Alcohol and Driving
modules.description: Understanding blood alcohol levels, effects on driving ability, and legal consequences

modules.title: Drugs and Medication
modules.description: How different substances affect driving performance and reaction times

modules.title: Fatigue and Attention
modules.description: Recognizing signs of fatigue and maintaining focus while driving

modules.title: Risk Assessment
modules.description: Identifying and evaluating potential hazards on the road

modules.title: Peer Pressure
modules.description: Dealing with social pressure and making responsible driving decisions

modules.title: Consequences
modules.description: Understanding the legal, financial, and personal consequences of risky driving

requirements.title: Requirements
list: Course must be completed before practical test
